person.persName: John F. Sheriff (Williamstown (Grant co) merchant & postmaster)

body.p: Williamstown, Kentucky, merchant. Ireland native. Appointed postmaster of Williamstown on January 14, 1858. Merchant in Williamstown in 1860.
